attributes.action: Stop Altaf Hussein from killings people in Karachi
attributes.additional_details: Altaf Hussein is a British national who is the head of MQM (Mutahidda Qoumi Movement) which is political party in Pakistan. He is living in exile in UK for last 21 years and is responsible for killing thousands of civilians and his opponents in Karachi. We demand British Government to strip him off the British nationality and send him to Pakistan for facing charges against him and other members of his party for the murder of his political opponents.
